Copyright © Astrodienst AG / Astrodatabank: Important notice: The data in the optional section research_data (categories, relationships, events) of each data record are made available for astrological research purposes only. Publication or distribution of these data is restricted and requires an individual permission by the copyright holder. These data must not be included or used in a service which is offered via software, for example on the Internet or via Apps or PC software packages.
The sourcenotes for each entry are written by Astrodatabank editors, and copyright © Astrodienst AG / Astrodatabank. The element 'shortbiography' contains the first line of a longer biography text, written by Astrodatabank editors, sometimes containing quoted phrases from Wikipedia. It is under copyright © Astrodienst AG / Astrodatabank, and, where indicated, possibly © Wikipedia. An element 'wikipedia_link' is included with such entries.
